root.name: Chronicles of Mystery: The Secret Tree of Life
root.description: Chronicles of Mystery: The Secret Tree of Life is a hidden objects puzzle game, featuring point-and-click game mechanics and requiring critical thinking skills. Sylvie Leroux is a young archaeologist trying to unearth the Tree of Life without falling victim to its powerful temptations as well. Ruthless assassins will chase her across exotic locations and even through time itself.
